name: Tornado Tower
description:
THIS IS A FREE DEMO. GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT.

SUMMARY

Tornado Tower is a VR, 3rd Person, Platformer game where you play as two characters at once: The Adventurer  and The Wind Spirit.  Using the Oculus Rift and the Oculus Touch,  players interact and experience a  new twist to  the classic Platformer genre in a 360 World.

This game is made to play on your couch, in a chair,  or at your desk and does not need massive room to play. Head and upper body movement is encouraged to enhance the best VR experience in your open, 360 world.

NUMBER OF PLAYERS:

1

ESTIMATED TIME:

20-40 minutes 

You are welcome to play longer and explore the Tornado Tower world, but please know your limits and stop if it gets too much for you (e.g. dizziness, sickness, and other common side effects that VR can do to people).

ENGINE:

Unreal

MADE BY TEAM:

Dizzy Slugs

REQUIREMENTS:

-Oculus Rift

-Oculus Touch

-Oculus Motion Sensors (x2)

This is the hardware that Oculus recommends for the best Rift experience. You can have a better processor, graphics card, and more RAM without causing any problems.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (equivalent or better)
  • Graphics card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better)
  • RAM: 8GB or more
  • Video output: HDMI 1.3
  • USB: Three USB 3.0 and one USB 2.0
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
